create cumulative_events instance for state data from NYT

Source: R/nyt.R
cumulative_events_nyt_state.Rd

create cumulative_events instance for state data from NYT

cumulative_events_nyt_state(
  src,
  eventtype = "confirmed",
  statename = "Massachusetts"
)

Arguments

src

a tibble
eventtype

character(1) 'confirmed' or 'deaths'
statename

character(1) state name

Examples

nyt = nytimes_state_data()
mass = cumulative_events_nyt_state(nyt, eventtype = "confirmed",
   statename = "Massachusetts")
mass
#> cumulative event data for Massachusetts, 2020-02-01 to 2020-05-16 
#> use plot() to visualize.
imass = form_incident_events(trim_from(mass, "2020-03-01"))
plot(imass)
